data.title: The Guardian
data.text:
In his all too short years of fame, Bob Peck (Obituary, April 8) often tended to play the parts of driven and tortured men very Yorkshire. But as a budding actor at Leeds Modern School, Alan Bennett's thespian nursery as well, he was also wonderfully funny, generous and wry.

Bob Peck's range

Throughout the brutal reign of terror in Chile during the 1970s, the name of Cardinal Archbishop Raul Silva Henriquez, who has died aged 91, spelt a message of hope for victims of human rights violations.

Cardinal Archbishop Raul Silva Henriquez obituary
